scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { require('husky').install() } catch (e) {if (e.code !== 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND') throw e}" && yarn build
scripts.dev: yarn workspaces foreach --all --interlaced --verbose --parallel --jobs unlimited run dev
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --all --interlaced --verbose --topological --jobs unlimited run build
scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach --all --interlaced --verbose --parallel --jobs unlimited run clean && rimraf node_modules
